testCaseBlueprint.name: E2E Video 360 exp3 with bandwidth limitation test case v4
testCaseBlueprint.description: E2E v360 experimenti with bandwith limitation v4
testCaseBlueprint.configurationScript: [ ! -e hosts ] || rm hosts && touch hosts && echo "server ansible_host=$$vmIpAddress ansible_user=$$username ansible_ssh_pass=$$password ansible_become_pass=$$password" | tee -a hosts && export ANSIBLE_HOST_KEY_CHECKING=False && ansible-playbook -i hosts execute_script.yml -e 'script="bash /var/www/html/vr360/templateTopics.sh 172.17.73.103 $$metric.topic.throughput"'
testCaseBlueprint.executionScript: [ ! -e hosts ] || rm hosts && touch hosts && echo "server ansible_host=$$vmIpAddress ansible_user=$$username ansible_ssh_pass=$$password ansible_become_pass=$$password" | tee -a hosts && export ANSIBLE_HOST_KEY_CHECKING=False && ansible-playbook -i hosts execute_script.yml -e 'script="bash /var/www/html/vr360/exp3_bandwidth_limitation_VM.sh"'; ! -e hosts ] || rm hosts && touch hosts && echo "server ansible_host=$$vmIpAddress ansible_user=$$username ansible_ssh_pass=$$password ansible_become_pass=$$password" | tee -a hosts && export ANSIBLE_HOST_KEY_CHECKING=False && ansible-playbook -i hosts execute_script.yml -e 'script="bash /var/www/html/vr360/stop_exp_VM.sh"'
